guardians.controllers

Class SchedulerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • guardians.controllers.SchedulerHandler

  • @Component
public class SchedulerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for dealing with the communication with the Scheduler system, whenever a Schedule is to be generated
    Author:
    miggoncan

public void startScheduleGeneration(Calendar calendar)
